query: SELECT id, name, description, price, features FROM services WHERE name LIKE '%cover%letter%' OR description LIKE '%cover%letter%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ijVUtDru4Z9cqPT.98f765e38313 --database YeXpL2RbTVxqVQqhWQzraf --execute SELECT id, name, description, price, features FROM services WHERE name LIKE '%cover%letter%' OR description LIKE '%cover%letter%';

rows.name: Entry Level Cover Letter
rows.description: Compelling cover letter for entry-level applications
rows.features: ["Tailored to job description","1 page","Professional tone","We work with you until you're 100% satisfied","2-3 business days delivery"]

rows.name: Professional Cover Letter
rows.description: Strategic cover letter for professional positions
rows.features: ["Customized to role","1 page","Achievement highlights","We work with you until you're 100% satisfied","2-3 business days delivery"]

rows.name: Executive Cover Letter
rows.features: ["Executive positioning","1 page","Leadership narrative","We work with you until you're 100% satisfied","1-2 business days delivery"]

rows.name: Basic Package
rows.description: Resume + Cover Letter for entry-level professionals
rows.features: ["Entry Level Resume","Entry Level Cover Letter","ATS-optimized","2 revisions per document","3-5 business days delivery","Save $23"]

rows.name: Standard Package
rows.description: Resume + Cover Letter + LinkedIn for professionals
rows.features: ["Professional Resume","Professional Cover Letter","LinkedIn Profile Optimization","3 revisions per document","3-5 business days delivery","Save $39"]

stdout:
id	name	description	price	features
